API description: Fetches the latest and daily average prices for the specified cryptocurrency in the given market and against the provided fiat currencies.

market.description: The market type, possible values include 'global' and 'local'.

crypto.description: The cryptocurrency to get ticker information for, default is 'ETH'.

fiats.description: If fiats parameter is included then only the values for those fiats will be returned (ETHUSD and ETHEUR in this example). If it's missing, then the response will contain ticker values of all available fiats for ETH.
